backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables and light/dark theme colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the full single‑page layout with all sections and header/footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying organization info, tagline, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo and navigation including scroll‑to‑section behavior and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact info and form with basic client‑side validation and simulated submission feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/GoalSec: Goal section highlighting the organization’s target and supporting mission cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, organization name, tagline, quote, and learn‑more button.
frontend/src/components/sections/MemberR: Renders a member registration form with client-side validation, simulated submission, and success feedback using UI components.
frontend/src/components/sections/OneRupe: Displays a section explaining the ₹1 support concept using localized content inside styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/ValuesS: Shows organizational values with localized text, icons, and a grid of value cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Welcome: Renders a welcome message, mission statement, quote, and mission highlights using localized content.
frontend/src/content/hi.ts: Provides Hindi-language content strings for organization text, values, mission, and support information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook, managing identity state, login, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend queries; currently returns an empty object.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a saffron-themed light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, extended theming, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the NGO website requirements, existing features, known issues, and metadata for build planning.
